main event: A civilian reported observing balloon-shaped objects traveling at high speeds over Indianapolis, Indiana on 28 April 1949.
interesting points: The observer described the objects as round and balloon-like,Estimated altitude of the objects was between 1000-2000 feet.,The estimated speed of the objects was reported to be 300-400 mph.,The report was made via long distance telephone call and lacked detailed confirmation.,There were no physical evidence or photographs accompanying the report.
witness description: a civilian who observed the objects from a distance
